title: Persiwa Wamena
text:
Persatuan Sepakbola Indonesia Wamena, commonly known as Persiwa Wamena is an Indonesian <a href="association%20football">football</a> club based in <a href="Wamena">Wamena</a>, <a href="Papua%20Province">Papua</a>, Indonesia. They play in the <a href="Liga%203%20%28Indonesia%29">Liga 3</a>.
History.
Although they became the runners-up in the <a href="2014%20Liga%20Indonesia%20Premier%20Division">2014 Liga Indonesia Premier Division</a> and got promoted, they were disqualified because they did not qualify during the verification process for the <a href="2015%20Indonesia%20Super%20League">2015 Indonesia Super League</a>. They then decided to accept the offer from PT Liga to play again in the <a href="Liga%20Indonesia%20Premier%20Division">Liga Indonesia Premier Division</a>.
